definition: to increase by degrees/in increasing order/incremental/progressive
to hand over/to pass on sth/to gradually increase or decrease/progressively

sentences.english: The organization templates are presented in increasing order of formality.
sentences.chinese: 我們依照形式化遞增的順序介紹組織模板。

sentences.english: Tumbling this price positions significantly increase potential null layout has been positive.
sentences.chinese: 今價重挫持倉量大幅遞增，追勢空單佈局甚爲積極。

sentences.english: The selling rate is increasing year by year and the company is developing fast.
sentences.chinese: 銷售率年年遞增，公司發展迅速。

sentences.english: Modest incremental price drop positions, empty single layout still in.
sentences.chinese: 價跌持倉量小幅遞增，空單佈局動作仍在。

sentences.english: This can be accomplished by working iteratively and incrementally.
sentences.chinese: 這是通過迭代遞增地工作來實現的。

sentences.english: OK. So now you've seen two simple examples.
sentences.chinese: 在我不再遞增變量之前，你知道的。

sentences.english: The second part is the increasing capacities.
The hundred - grain weight increased with the increasing nitrogen content.
sentences.chinese: 百粒重隨着施氮量呈現遞增趨勢。

sentences.english: Incremental changes to the interface are more difficult to manage.
sentences.chinese: 對接口的遞增更改更加難於管理。

sentences.english: Our sales are going up year after year. And we still have a large potential production capacity.
sentences.chinese: 銷量年年遞增，我們的生產潛力還很大。

sentences.english: The second increment might provide a catalog that consists of a simple list.
sentences.chinese: 第二個遞增項目可能是提供含有簡單清單的型錄。

sentences.english: With the rising of VGO distillate, the content of basic nitrogen gradually increases.
sentences.chinese: 隨着蠟油餾分的變重，鹼性氮含量呈遞增的變化趨勢。

sentences.english: The subtraction operators are also available, providing the converse of the add and increment operations.
sentences.chinese: 也可用減號運算符，它的作用與相加和遞增操作相反。

sentences.english: North - south interstate are odd-numbered and increase from west to east.
sentences.chinese: 南北向的州際高速公路用奇數，數字由西向東遞增。

sentences.english: Results The optimal reserve price is lower than its cost, and the reserve price is increasing in the cost.
sentences.chinese: 結果賣方最優保留價低於其成本，且隨成本遞增。

sentences.english: Sunitinib and capecitabine doses were escalated in serial patient cohorts.
sentences.chinese: 在這些患者中舒尼替尼和卡培他濱的劑量逐步遞增。
